name: .noReturn
description:
Simple project made for Game a Week (theme: Return).

Move with WASD or Arrow Keys, Jump with Space. "R" to restart the level.

Music is Royalty Free Music from Bensound.

Although I wish I had more creativity (and time) working on the level design, I'm quite proud of how neatly the project is organized, and the scripts are readable and easily adjusted. This was well put together enough that I should be able to recycle most of the scripts.

The mechanic is solid, although much more could be added (moving platforms, moving camera levels, maybe wall grabbable surfaces) , I'll try and come back to it sometime, add more levels, and release a version which I'm more proud of.

Also, the aesthetics ended up quite pleasing, although I wish I had more art expertise to do something other then geometric assets (maybe something to work on the next weeks?)
